alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:12PM EDT until July 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...GADSDEN...NORTHERN LIBERTY...LEON...DECATUR...GRADY AND SOUTHEASTERN SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 312 PM EDT/212 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greensboro, or 7 miles west of Quincy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Midway, Florida A and M, Cairo, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Gretna, Bristol, Attapulgus, Climax and Lake Bradford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
